page.title: 08OLDEST SCHOOL_SKELMERSDALE
page.content: The school has changed a lot since then. It was partly re-built in 1888 and almost entirely re-built in 1911. The present headmaster is Mr. P. A. Caine. There are six classes altogether: 1 nursery class, 2 infant and 3 Junior classes. We have a hall for assembly and P.E., a library and television room and a dining room. Our class, called "Top Class", is the newest part of the school. It was built in 1934. We have also a small playground and 1984 was the first year that we used our new playing field.
